Like all rural residents, Burhon's family is also involved in raising livestock, that is, buying and selling cattle. But this is not Burhon's main job. Burhon has himself a small shop in the center of the village. He was always drawn to eastern cooking, loved the delicious dishes and most importantly the useful nutrients. Over time, Burhon's desires and interests have been fulfilled in his activities. He began to produce and sell our national dishes. Similarly, Burhon makes all of our famous, beloved traditional "sambusu" (meat pies), which he bakes in a special tandoor ovens. His wife helps him in this work. But for preparing sambusu, Burhon does not trust anyone; he prepares those himself. Customers are very pleased and glad that even in their village such a place can be found, where one can get a quick and tasty snack.

Burhon's work went well, and the business is slowly developing. Burhon first of all thanks MDO Arvand. Since he took money in a loan, he started his own business and has been working with this organization for two years. Here again Burhon wants to take a loan to purchase a few bags of flour and butter. He expresses his gratitude for the support and trust!

loans.use: to  buy flour and butter

loans.name: Deysi Rubelina

texts.es:
Deysi, es casada, tiene dos hijos, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos en casa propia, desde muy joven aprendió de sus padres la elaboración de petates, oficio que actualmente lo desempeña para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar, también se dedica a la crianza  de cerdos y ganado, por el momento no se le hace difícil realizar dichas actividades.
Con el capital ella comprará una vaca y tule que es la materia prima para elaborar los petates que luego vende por mayor, espera fortalecer el negocio, aumentar la producción, tener mejores ingresos con los que podrá cancelar las cuotas de la deuda y mejorara las condiciones de vida de su familia.
Sueña con tener los recursos necesarios para reparar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Deysi is married and has two children.  She lives with her husband and children in her own house.  From a young age, Deysi learned to make grass mats from her parents and she now carries out this activity in order to support her husband with household costs.  In addition, Deysi raises pigs and cattle and, for now, Deysi has not had any difficulties doing this work.

With this loan, Deysi will buy a cow and tule, the basic material she uses to make the grass mats.  She will sell the mats in bulk.  Deysi hopes to strengthen her business, increase production  and have a higher income with which to pay off this loan.  She also hopes to improve her and her family's living conditions.

Deysi's dream is to have the necessary income to repair her home.

loans.use: to buy a cow and tule.

loans.name: Kanzada

texts.ru: Канзаде 62 года, не замужем, одна воспитала 4 детей. Все дети женаты, находятся на заработках в России, только самый старший вместе со своей семьей проживает вместе с Канзадой, помогает матери по хозяйству. Остальные дети периодически высылают деньги на поддержание матери. У Канзады - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Канзада занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 34 года назад, с покупки скота на 3,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Канзады, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, а также имеет земельный надел размером 2,0 ГА, на которой выращивает кукурузу и клевер для обеспечения скота кормами. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Канзада обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку бычков для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Канзада планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Kanzada is 62, unmarried, and raising 4 children.  All her children are married and are migrant workers in Russia except for her oldest, who lives with her and helps her with her daily chores.  Her other children periodically send money back home to help support their mother.  She has the equivalent of a high school education, and is a crop- and livestock farmer.  She first started raising livestock 34 years ago with 3,000 som worth of animals, and, thanks to her persistence, currently has 2 dairy cows and 2 hectares of land for growing corn and clover (which she uses to feed her cows), while her monthly income has risen to nearly 15,000 som.

To further develop her farm, Kanzada is seeking a loan from Bai Tushum & Partners to buy some bull calves, which she plans on raising and fattening to resell at a profit.  She hopes to use any future profits due to the loan to continue to buy even more livestock for her farm.

loans.use: buy cattle for fattening and resale

loans.name: Dora Del Carmen

texts.es:
Dora, está acompañada, tiene dos hijas las cuales están estudiando, ella vive en casa alquilada, se dedica a vender ropa, es un oficio que aprendió por su cuanta debido a la necesidad de cubrir los gastos de su hogar, atiende su negocio todos los días de 7:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m., su puesto de venta lo tiene el una de las calles principales de la ciudad donde reside.
La inversión será para comprar camisas, blusas, faldas, vestidos, pantalones y ropa interior, para ambos sexos, con esto su negocio estará surtido para estas épocas navideñas en la que sus clientes tienen más exigencias, espera satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, aumentar sus ventas, y mejorar sus ganancias con las que ira cancelando puntualmente sus cuotas.
Sueña con dar a sus hijas la oportunidad estudiar y superarse, ya que ella no la tuvo.
texts.en:
Dora has a partner and two children, who are in school.  Dora lives in a rented house and makes a living selling clothes, a trade she learned on her own as she needed to cover household costs.  She works every day from 7am until 5pm and has a stall in one of the main streets in her city.

Dora will use this investment to buy shirts, blouses, skirts, dresses, trousers and underwear for men and women.  With these items, her business will be stocked up for the Christmas season, when demand is higher.  Dora hopes to satisfy her customers' needs, increase sales, and improve her profits, which she will use to pay off her debt on time.

Dora dreams of giving her children something that she herself did not have: the opportunity to study and prosper.

loans.use: to buy shirts, blouses, skirts, dresses, trousers and underwear.

loans.name: Manuchehr

texts.ru: Манучехр родился  1994 года. После окончания школы советом родителей он поступил в Таджикский Государственный Экономический Университет. Данное время является студентом 2 курса. Он очень способный молодой человек. Манучехр увлекается спортом и в свободное время читает зарубежную литературу.  Родители не в состоянии оплатить за его учебу в университете. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы в университет. Он ждет вашу доброту. Этот займ поможем молодому человеку окончить университет и реализовать свои знания в будущем.
texts.en:
Manuchehr was born in 1994. After finishing school, on the advice of his parents he enrolled in the Tajik State Economics University. Currently, he is a second year student. He is a very capable, young man. Manuchehr is interested in sports and in his spare time reads foreign literature.

His parents are not in a position to pay form his schooling in university. He is requesting a loan to pay tuition. This loan will help the young man to complete university and to achieve his knowledge in the future.

loans.use: to pay for tuition

loans.name: Alba Nancy

texts.es:
Alba es una mujer trabajadora y entregada a su familia, razón por la que decidió montar su propio negocio en la casa donde reside, con el ánimo de ser productiva al mismo tiempo que puede estar pendiente de sus 3 hijos. Es confeccionista desde hace 17 años, oficio que aprendió de su madre y adquirió experiencia trabajando en diferentes talleres y empresas pero, hace 10 años inició con su proyecto productivo independiente; produce todo tipo de prendas, pero especialmente camisas para dama, la producción que saca es vendida entre sus familiares, amigos y vecinos del sector y, además envía algunas prendas para otras ciudades donde le hacen encargos. Trabaja sola todos los días de 5 am a 6 pm y cuando es temporada alta contrata a otra persona para que le colabore.
Alba ha encontrado en los créditos el apoyo para hacer crecer su negocio y por ello realiza la solicitud, pues con el dinero comprará insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, botones, accesorios, encajes, entre otros), esto le permitirá tener más variedad de insumos para satisfacer los diversos gustos de sus clientes, lo que aumentará sus ventas y los ingresos que percibe por su labor.
El sueño de Alba es montar un almacén en el que pueda vender sus producciones y además desea incursionar el sistema de maquila para generar mejores ingresos que le garanticen una estabilidad financiera con la que pueda brindar a sus hijos una educación de buena calidad y un mejor bienestar.
texts.en:
Alba is a hardworking woman who is dedicated to her family which is why she decided to set up her own business in her home, all with the intention of being productive at the same time as being there for her three children.

She has been a clothes manufacturer for 17 years, a trade which she learnt from her mother and she obtained experience working in different businesses and workshops, however, 10 years ago she started her own activity. She produces all kinds of clothes, but in particular blouses for women. The goods that she makes are sold to her relatives, friends and neighbors in the area. In addition, she sends some clothes to other cities where orders have been placed. She works alone every day from 5 am to 6 pm, and when it is peak period, she employs another person to help her.

Through these loans, Alba has found the support she needs to grow her business, and this is why she is making the request. Using this money, she will buy supplies in bulk (fabrics, threads, buttons, accessories, laces and so on). This will allow her to have a larger variety of supplies to meet the various requirements of her customers, which will increase her sales and the profits that she earns through her work.

Alba dreams of setting up a store in which she can sell her goods and she also wants to get involved in the assembly line to generate larger profits that will enable financial stability with which she can provide her children with an education of a good quality and a better wellness.

loans.use: to buy supplies in bulk (fabrics, threads, buttons, accessories, lace and so on).

loans.name: Mwanahijah

texts.en:
Mwanahijah is a married woman with four school going children. She owns a house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Mwanahijah operates a food making business making consumables such as  beans and chapati (flat bread) for sale to passersby and neighbours. 

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase food items such as wheat flour, cooking oil, sugar and beans. She dreams of expanding her business to earn more income and establish a restaurant in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase food items such as wheat flour, cooking oil, sugar and beans.

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es: Doña María tiene 62 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos, vive en el municipio de Santa Cruz de Yojoa, junto a su esposo, dos hijas y un nieto. Hace 8 años que doña María se  dedicado a vender mercadería como ropa para damas, caballeros y niños mediante pedidos y entrega a domicilio, y en su casa también vende refrescos, churros, dulces y galletas. Ella anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de tortillas, es una señora muy emprendedora, siempre busca como obtener sus ingresos. Ha decidido solicitar un tercer préstamo a ODEF para mantener activo su negocio, el cual es por 4,000.00 lempiras y va comprar más refrescos, churros, dulces y ropa para incrementar su inventario y aumentar las ventas. Tiene como meta establecer el negocio en un local céntrico y ampliarlo más.
texts.en:
Doña María is 62 years old, married, has four children, and lives in the town of Santa Cruz de Yojoa along with her husband, two daughters, and a grandson.  For eight years, Doña María has made a living selling merchandise like clothing for women, men, and children.  She takes orders and makes home deliveries.  She sells soft drinks, churros, sweets, and cookies from home.  Previously, she made a living selling tortillas.  She is a very enterprising woman; she is always looking for ways get income.  

She decided to request a third loan from ODEF in order to keep her business active.  The loan is for 4,000 lempiras, and she will use it to buy more soft drinks, churros, sweets, and clothing in order to increase her inventory and augment her sales.  Her goal is to set up the business in a place in the center of town and expand it more.

loans.use: to buy more products to sell like soft drinks, churros, sweets, and clothing in general.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen, age 44, is a married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband at the corner of her house. She has 4 years of experience in this field. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts over the years. 

She is a mother of three children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business so she availed herself of a 3rd loan of PKR 30,000 through Kashf Foundation to buy packs of grains, biscuits and beverages to meet with the increasing demand at her store. She is expecting boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of grains, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Shehnaz

texts.en: Shehnaz is a 44-years-old married woman and the mother of four children. The man shown in the photo is Shehnaz’s husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Shehnaz has applied for a loan of PKR  30,000, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Shehnaz is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Lideres De Santa Rosa Group

texts.es: Julia  de 49 años es  casada con 03 hijos independientes, actualmente es socia del grupo “Líderes De Santa Rosa” constituida por 15 mujeres  responsables, que han ido mejorando a través de sus negocios. Este es el caso de Julia la cual se dedica a la venta de productos  de primera necesidad, en un mercado de su localidad. Se siente feliz pues con su trabajo sigue ayudando a su pareja con los gastos del hogar. Su último crédito lo destinará para la compra de abarrotes, bebidas y panetones,  pues lo piensa ofrecer por campaña navideña. Seguir implementando su negocio es su mayor anhelo. El grupo “Líderes De Santa Rosa” agradece  la ayuda brindada y se comprometen a seguir trabajando bien. Julia se encuentra de pie, es la segunda del lado izquierdo y viste polo morado. Elizabeth y Teodora no pudieron estar presentes por motivo de trabajo.
texts.en:
Julia is 49 years old, married, and has three adult children.  She is a member of the “Líderes De Santa Rosa” group, made up of 15 responsible ladies who have been improving because of their businesses.

Julia sells primary needs products at a local market, is happy with her work, and continues to help her husband with the household expenses.  She will use the money from this loan to buy groceries, drinks, and pastries for the Christmas campaign.  Her greatest desire is to continue growing her business.

The “Líderes De Santa Rosa” group is grateful for the help and are committed to continue working well.  Julia is standing.  She is the second from the left, wearing a purple top.  Elizabeth and Teodora were not able to attend due to work commitments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Channy

texts.en:
Channy is a villager from Kompong Speu province. She is 45 years old, and a mother of four children. Presently, all of her children are studying. To support the family, she and her husband make rice cakes to sell and they also sell firewood. She has been in this business for ten years. 

Channy has been a client with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and her previous loans have helped her to improve her family's conditions and to keep her children in school. She is applying for new loan with VisionFund in order to cover school fees for her daughter, who is studying accounting at the university. She hopes that her daughter will finish her courses successfully and have a good job after graduation and that her family’s condition will continue to improve.

loans.use: To cover her daughter's school fees

loans.name: Phirum

texts.en:
Phirun is a villager from the Doun Keo district in Takeo province. She is a mother of six children, four of whom are dependents. She farms rice and works as a teacher. She also raises pigs and cows to support the family. She has been involved in her business for 33 years, and she currently earns about 9 dollars per day. 

Phirun is applying for her sixth loan. She is seeking an education loan to pay school fees for her daughter, who attends university and is majoring in accounting. She hopes that her kid can get a good job after graduation.

loans.use: To pay for her daughter's university tuition

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to dig a well and buy a water pump .

loans.name: Yazan

texts.en:
Yazan is 20-years-old; he lives with his parents in the village at Ramallah city, he works at a carpentry work shop as an employee.

Yazan is asking Ryada for this loan to buy flagstones to pave his house and paint it.  He wants to help his family with this loan to improve the house and make it better, which will enable him to live with more physical comforts.  He has a shortage of money to buy the things he needs and help his parents.  He is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to buy flagstones to pave and paint his house.

loans.name: Kuthea's Group

texts.en:
Kuthea is a 41-year-old mother of one kid living in Mongkol Borey in Banteay Meanchey province, Cambodia.

To feed the family, she is a wedding embellisher (decorator), and her husband has been a rice farmer for twenty-one years. These businesses return to her around 40,000 KHR per day. Kuthea is a borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for her first loan cycle. Now she leads a group of three, she and her group member, in applying for 3,600,000 KHR.

As the group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy more embellishment supplies for her business. She hopes her business will grow properly to improve her family’s situation and standard of living, and to earn extra income.

loans.use: to buy more embellishment supplies for her business

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a face massage machine, chair and hair washing machine

loans.name: La Florida Group

texts.es: El grupo la “La Florida” conformada por 07 socias dedicadas a distintas actividades de comercio y pasan a su 08  ciclo. Aurea de 65 años separada con 07 hijos independientes. Actualmente alquila habitaciones  en su vivienda. Este negocio surgió gracias a la motivación de sus hijos, pues son ellos quienes la apoyan. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para arreglos de su vivienda y de esta manera darles una mejor atención a sus inquilinos. Más adelante piensa construir más habitaciones para poder alquilarlos. El grupo “La Florida” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible éste crédito y se comprometen a seguir trabajando bien.   Aurea se encuentra de pie, es la primera del lado derecho y viste polo negro.
texts.en:
The "La Florida" group is made up of seven members who make a living through various commerce jobs and are on their eighth loan cycle.  

Aurea, 65, is separated and has seven independent children.  She currently rents out rooms in her house.  This business came about thanks to the motivation of her children, because they support her.  The loan that she is requesting will be used to make repairs on her house, so that she can provide better care to her tenants.  In the future she wishes to build more rooms that she can rent.  

The "La Florida" group is grateful to the people who have made this loan possible and they promise to continue working hard.  

Aurea is standing in the photo.  She is the first woman on the right and is wearing a black shirt.

loans.use: to repair her house.

loans.name: Azra

texts.en:
Azra, a 42-year-old married mother of three children, has been selling milk for many years. She initiated the business by buying a buffalo to help support her family at a time when her husband was the only income earner. With the passage of time her sales, along with her income, have increased, and she now has two buffalo and one cow. She also sells animals on a seasonal basis to generate extra income.

This has all happened due to Azra's courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family and financial matters.  

Azra has some savings and has applied for a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. This will be her seventh loan from Kashf Foundation, and she has shown good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Santos Romero

texts.es:
Santos, es acompañada, vive junto a su compañero de vida, su madre y un niño, para cubrir parte de sus gastos familiares ha puesto en práctica lo que aprendió de su madre el cual es elaborar tortillas para luego venderlas, tiene un horario de de 5: 00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m., posee mucha demanda.
Con el préstamo comprara maíz, leña, gas propano, cal y bolsas, con lo que seguirá trabajando, espera aumentar su producción, dar a sus clientes un buen servicio y mejorar sus ganancias con las que seguirá aportando en los gastos de su hogar, además podrá cancelar su deuda.
Aspira a tener un negocio mucho más grande con lo que tendrá los recursos para seguir adelante.
texts.en:
Santos is in a common-law marriage and lives with her partner, her mother and her child. In order to cover part of the family's costs, she has put into practice what she learned from her mother; that is, she makes tortillas to sell. She has a work schedule of 5am to 5pm, and there is a lot of demand.

Santos will buy maize, firewood, propane gas, lime and bags with the loan. This will allow her to continue working, She hopes to increase production, offer a good service to her customers and improve her profits, which will mean she can continue to help out with the household costs and also pay off her loan. Her dream is to have a much bigger business, which will give her the means to get on in life.

loans.use: to buy maize, firewood, propane gas, lime and bags.

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia is a 34-year-old married lady; she has been stitching clothes for the past 4 years. She stitches for the people of her community, and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to a lack of available funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. 

For this reason she requested a loan of Rs 25,000 from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan to buy more spools of thread in different colors, along with packs of lace, zippers, and buttons. 

It will allow her to stitch up more dresses on time to generate a healthier source of income. 

She is in her second loan cycle with a good repayment history.

loans.use: to buy thread in different colors, along with packs of lace, zippers, and buttons.

loans.name: Azra

texts.en:
Azra is a 25-year-old married woman who has been running a business selling milk with her husband for the past 5 years. 

She has one cow, which she uses for milk selling to the people of her locality. She also sells butter and cheese to generate an extra amount of profit.  Azra has become famous for providing good quality milk, and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. She has gradually improved her business with the support of the Kashf Foundation. 

Currently she is in her fifth loan cycle, and has applied for a loan of PKR 35,000. This will allow her to purchase one more cow. 

Azra is hopeful that this loan will will bring positive changes to her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sewing tools like fabric, threads, and a sewing machine

loans.name: Suliman

texts.en:
Suliman is 44 years old; he lives with his wife and his five children in a village at Nablus. He works as a contractor. 

Suliman has asked Ryada for this loan in order to paint his house and repair his ceiling, which will help him to take a step forward, because he has a shortage of money to buy the things he needs. He is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to paint his house and repair his ceiling

loans.name: Mjjli

texts.en:
Mjjli is 34-years-old.  He works in the drilling business and lives in the Tulkarem camp.

He is doing some repair work to his house to get ready for marriage, but he has a shortage of money, so he asked Ryada for this loan in order to paint the house and repair the ground.  With this, his home will reflect better living conditions and will help him to take a step forward.  He is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to paint his house and repair the ground.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make a separate wall between the living room and the kitchen with a ceiling.

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Daniela es una joven activa, dinámica y emprendedora de 23 años de edad, que desde muy pequeña le ha gustado hacer manualidades y cosas en las que pueda explotar su mente creativa. Es estudiante de comunicación audiovisual y además tiene su propio negocio, produce accesorios de bisutería para dama; el oficio lo aprendió viendo a un amigo que realizaba la misma labor y, comenzó a hacer algunos artículos para uso personal como un hobbie, pero luego se contactó con algunos almacenes que vieron su trabajo y les gustó, razón por la que ahora los vende; cuenta con el apoyo de dos empleadas que trabajan todos los días en la jornada de la tarde; así ha logrado generar ingresos para aportar a la economía del hogar y para pagar sus estudios universitarios.
El crédito que solicita es un apoyo para mejorar su negocio, con el dinero comprará 3 mesas de trabajo, 3 sillas e insumos al por mayor (pedrería, cadenas, hilos, cintas, broches y otros), esto le permitirá mejorar las condiciones de trabajo y además podrá cumplir con los pedidos que tiene pendientes; además estará en la capacidad de adquirir nuevos contratos, mejorando los ingresos que recibe por su labor.
Daniela se proyecta para un futuro a mediano plazo teniendo su taller mucho más amplio, en el que pueda generar más oportunidades de empleo y que su marca y productos sean reconocidos a nivel nacional, abriéndose paso para ser una gran distribuidora y generando mayor rentabilidad para poder disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida y ser una profesional exitosa.
texts.en:
Daniela is an active, dynamic and enterprising woman of 23 years of age who, from early on has liked crafts and things in which she can develop her creativity. She is a student in audiovisual communication and also has her own business where she makes jewelry for women. She learned this trade from a friend who carried out the same work and he started making a few items for her own use as a hobby. Later on, she contacted a few stores which saw her work and liked the goods, hence why she is now selling them, she has the support of two employees who work every day in the afternoon. In this manner, she has managed to generate an income to support her household's income and pay for her university studies.

The loan that Daniela is seeking is a means of support to improve her business; with the money from the loan, she will buy three work benches, 3 chairs and supplies in bulk (jewels, chains, threads, ribbons, broaches and so on). All of this will allow her to improve the working conditions and meet the orders that are pending as well as be in a position to earn new contracts, improving the profits that she makes through her work.

Daniela is planning for the mid-term future, owning a much larger workshop, in which she can generate more job opportunities and that her brand and products become renowned nationally, paving the way to being a large distributor and generating larger profits to enjoy a better quality of life and be a successful professional.

loans.use: to buy three work benches, 3 chairs and supplies in bulk (jewels, chains, threads, ribbons, broaches and more).
